github.description: GitHub integration - CRITICAL (8/8 agents rated HIGH/CRITICAL). Enables issue management, PR operations, milestone tracking. Get token from https://github.com/settings/tokens with scopes: repo, workflow, write:packages, read:org

sequential-thinking.description: Structured problem-solving - CRITICAL (8/8 agents rated HIGH/CRITICAL). Enables step-by-step analysis for complex decisions. No API key required.

context7.description: Latest library documentation - HIGH (6/8 agents rated HIGH). Provides current FastAPI, SQLAlchemy, React, MUI docs. Get free API key from https://context7.com (100 requests/day).

playwright.description: E2E testing automation - HIGH (5/8 agents rated CRITICAL for specialized testing). Install Week 5-6 for frontend testing phase. No API key required.

duckduckgo.description: Web search for error solutions - OPTIONAL (3/8 agents rated MEDIUM). Provides DuckDuckGo web search capabilities. No API key required.

puppeteer.description: Browser automation - OPTIONAL. Automate web interactions for tasks like GitHub Project setup. No API key required.

metadata.description: MCP server configuration based on agent consultation. All 8 agents consulted: 8/8 approved GitHub+Sequential Thinking, 6/8 approved Context7, 5/8 approved Playwright, 3/8 approved DuckDuckGo.
